properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Kinywa changu kitasimulia haki
na wokovu wako,
kitasimulia haki
na wokovu wako. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ndiwe peke yako kinga langu,
unikinge Bwana na mkorofi.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Mikononi mwako
Bwana niokoe,
unisikie Bwana, uniokoe.
